original_title: Amsel: Illustrator of the Lost Art
overview: The first in-depth profile of legendary illustrator Richard Amsel (1947-1985), detailing the artist's remarkable body of work, while chronicling an enigmatic life marked with personal heartbreak, celebrity friendships, creative genius, and a tragic end at the age of thirty-seven.
tagline: He ruled the world of entertainment art, in a life and career all too brief.
title: Amsel: Illustrator of the Lost Art
